name: No-name Ball Game
description:
WASD & Space is how you do stuff & things.

Imagine if you actually played golf but it was an endless Looter, Physics-based action game, & Randomly Generated Dungeon-crawling RPG.

ok, that last part is a bit ambitious... But here's the first prototype! You control a ball, you roll, you hit, you loot chests and kill skellies.

Points are meaningless for now. Who cares?
